content: Yes, there are helicopter services available for transport in Sandown. Several companies offer scenic helicopter tours of the Isle of Wight, including Sandown. These tours allow you to explore the town from above, providing a unique and breathtaking view of the area. Some of the helicopter tour companies in Sandown include Wightlink Helicopters and Vectis Helicopters. However, it's important to note that these services can be quite expensive, so it's advisable to check prices and book in advance to ensure availability.
